Setting.Name: submit
Setting.Help: Overrides the Text for the Search link

Setting.Name: cssClass
Setting.Help: Overrides the CSS class used to render the Search link

Setting.Name: showSite
Setting.Help: Instructs the Search control to display an internal Site search option

Setting.Name: showWeb
Setting.Help: Instructs the Search control to display an external Web search option

Setting.Name: useWebForSite
Setting.Help: Instructs the Search control to use the external Web search feature for the internal Site search

Setting.Name: MinCharRequired
Setting.Help: minium chars required to trigger auto search

Setting.Name: AutoSearchDelayInMilliSecond
Setting.Help: The millisecond to delay trigger auto search
